short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Know your air. This extension displays the latest air pollution levels from the Sussex Air Quality Monitoring Network.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Local Authorities.
Scroll though the boroughs of Sussex to find monitoring stations near you.

Maps.
Hourly updated interactive maps give you a overview of pollution levels across the South coast.

Video Guide.
Ten short videos on commonly asked questions about air pollution and health.

Alerts.
This extension will run in the background and alert you when pollution levels rise to Moderate or above.

**If you like this, check out our new Android App!
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.org.londonair.sussex


The Sussex Air Quality Partnership promotes improvements in air quality related issues in Sussex. 
The partnership is made up from representatives from City, Borough and District Councils in East and West Sussex, East and West Sussex County Councils, the Sussex Health Protection Agency, Sussex Primary Care Trusts, the Environment Agency, the University of Sussex and the University of Brighton.

The Environmental Research Group (ERG) at Kingâ€™s College London is London's leading air quality information and research group.
http://www.sussex-air.net

This application is possible thanks to the continued support and participation of the boroughs of Sussex in the Sussex Air Quality Partnership.

Designed and developed by Paul McIlreavy with additional graphics and UI by Andrew Grieve.
